name: Text Adventure
description:
Text Adventure, by Joey Pawelko, is a visually astonishing story game with a beautiful soundtrack and fluid gameplay. Players explore a hand-drawn world filled with psychedelic entities, and slowly uncover the secrets of their own existence.

Features
-Single player
-Story
-Hand-drawn visuals
-Great Music

Controls
Actions are performed by typing into the text box. For instance, typing "Go Up" will move you upward if there is a path in that direction, and typing "Talk Npc Name" will enter you into dialogue with that Npc.

Look at art, listen to jazz, and immerse yourself in the world of Joey Pawelko's Text Adventure.
